sqlMap.select: SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD GIS_ASSETS_CODE , GIS_ASSETS_CD , GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , GIS_ASSETS_NM , GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , GIS_ASSETS_LNM , GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , GIS_ASSETS_AR , GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CD.CODE = GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND ROWNUM = 1) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM , GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_CODE , GIS_ASSETS_CD , GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , GIS_ASSETS_NM , GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , GIS_ASSETS_LNM ||'-'|| GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB AS GIS_ASSETS_LNM , GIS_ASSETS_AR , GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD , GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE 1=1
GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd#
GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#
GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsNm# || '%'
GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
ORDER BY GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex#) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE 1=1
GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd#
GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#
GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsNm# || '%'
GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #gisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
